text: KZDB (100.5 FM) is a radio station licensed to Roswell, New Mexico, United States. The station is currently owned Majestic Broadcasting, LLC. On August 1, 2017, KZDB changed their format from classic rock (which moved to KSFX 1230 AM) to adult contemporary, branded as "100.5 Kool FM".Majestic Shakes Up Roswell Cluster Radioinsight - August 2, 2017 ==References== ==External links== * ZDB Category:Radio stations established in 1992 Category:1992 establishments in New Mexico Category:Adult contemporary radio stations in the United States
title: KZDB
